<br><br>

This website provides supporting materials for the workshop **Analysing big open human mobility data and contrasting it with access to opportunities using R** which is part of the [11th International Conference on Computational Social Science](https://www.ic2s2-2025.org/){target="_blank"} held in Norrköping, Sweden on July 21-24, 2025. This tutorial is [licensed under CC0](license.qmd).

Workshop participants will use [spanishoddata](https://github.com/rOpenSpain/spanishoddata) R package [@r-spanishoddata] to access open human mobilty flows [@mitms_mobility_web] derived form mobile phones in Spain.

Stay tuned for updates!
